item.title: What Ingo is up to

item.description: ðŸ“– What I’m reading Palo Alto - Malcom Harris Built to Move - Juliet Starrett and Kelly Starrett ðŸ“º What I’m watching [Tour De France][https://www.letour.fr/en/] Sleeping Dog Searching For Italy ðŸ§° What I’m making ESP32 with E-Ink Display to display home automation data Might be behind Paywall Adjusting my blog settings to include this page in the RSS feed Working on a web app to build workout routines with timing and repetition information Started to create some generative Art with vsketch ðŸ”¬ What I’m learning Prep for US Citizienship Interview Front End Master - TypeScript (this is a lot of stuff) How to use FreeCAD
